publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3646 Mr Brian Monteith: Fife Country Dance Festival 2002—That the Parliament extends its best wishes to the organisers and participants in the 2002 Fife Schools Country Dance Festival, the largest festival of its kind in Britain, which is being held across the Kingdom between 20 and 29 November 2002 involving over 12,000 primary and special education pupils.
S1M-3646 Fife Country Dance Festival 2002 (lodged on 26 November 2002) Iain Smith*, Mr Keith Harding*

S1M-3646 Mr Brian Monteith: Fife Country Dance Festival 2002—That the Parliament extends its best wishes to the organisers and participants in the 2002 Fife Schools Country Dance Festival, the largest festival of its kind in Britain, which is being held across the Kingdom between 20 and 29 November 2002 involving over 12,000 primary and special education pupils.Supported by: Iain Smith, Mr Keith Harding, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3646 Fife Country Dance Festival 2002 (lodged on 26 November 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-3646 Fife Country Dance Festival 2002 (lodged on 26 November 2002) Tricia Marwick*
S1M-3646 Fife Country Dance Festival 2002 (lodged on 26 November 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*
S1M-3646 Fife Country Dance Festival 2002 (lodged on 26 November 2002) Bill Butler*

S1M-3646 Mr Brian Monteith: Fife Country Dance Festival 2002—That the Parliament extends its best wishes to the organisers and participants in the 2002 Fife Schools Country Dance Festival, the largest festival of its kind in Britain, which is being held across the Kingdom between 20 and 29 November 2002 involving over 12,000 primary and special education pupils. Supported by: Iain Smith, Mr Keith Harding, Donald Gorrie, Nora Radcliffe, Tricia Marwick, Mr Keith Raffan, Bill Butler
